dishes.description: Minced pork, chicken and shrimp or crab, water chestnut, green onion and seasonings in a steamed wonton, w/ dim sum sauce.
Skewered and grilled strips of chicken breast or shrimp marinated in yellow coconut curry served with peanut sauce and cucumber salad.

Our popular one to two pound whole fish-of-the-day, lightly battered and deep fried to seal in the flavor, served over our special three-flavor vegetable stir-fry, topped with large shrimp and sea scallops.
dishes.dish: Three Flavor Whole Fish w/ Shrimp and Scallops

dishes.description: Crispy and tender fried boneless half of a whole duck with savory holy basil sauce, a crisp medley of fresh vegetables, and garnished with crispy fried basil leaves.

dishes.description: Sliced chicken or fish, fresh button mushrooms in coconut cream soup seasoned with galangal, lemon grass, kaffir lime leaves, exotic spices, topped with cilantro.
